name: EDM
description: EDM is a groundbreaking cryptocurrency tailored for EDM enthusiasts, managed by the innovative EDM DAO. This dynamic community unites artists, DJs, producers, and fans globally. We craft immersive in-person experiences through spectacular EDM festivals and nurture a vibrant online community. As a token holder, you gain exclusive access to premier EDM events worldwide, with the ability to purchase tickets using EDM tokens and reserve VIP spots.
